channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Shows Off $5M 'Gold Card'
item.description: President Donald Trump greeted reporters on Air Force One by holding up a $5 million "gold card" immigrant visa.

item.title: Democrat Rep Jared Golden says his party's moving in 'wrong direction' on trade
item.description: Rep. Jared Golden, D-Maine, is warning his own party not to have "knee-jerk" reactions to President Donald Trump's tariff plan.
